roleset.name: remain, be left over, linger, visit

role.descr: attribute of arg1: state, location stayed in

example.name: stay-v: ergative
example.text: It is a passion that *trace* usually stays in the tower, however.

example.name: stay-v: with attribute
example.text: Consumer confidence stayed strong in October, despite the unsettling gyrations of the stock market.
example.arg: despite the unsettling gyrations of the stock market.

example.name: stay-v: PP attribute
example.text: The Soviet Union will stay on its record buying pace.

example.name: stay-v: All args
example.text: He-1 is doing his best *trace*-1 to stay young for his children.

example.name: stay-n: both args oblique
example.text: The two Cambodian prime ministers requested that the UN Secretary General extend the stay of his representative in Cambodia by six months or more .

roleset.note: STAY-V NOTES: Member of VN class exist-47.1-1 and lodge-46 (from stay.01-v)
STAY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stay-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls lodge-46. (from stay.01-n)

roleset.name: legal term: postpone, restraint, postponement

example.name: stay-v: pend-o-matic
example.text: The parties in the Connecticut case have agreed [*]to stay proceedings pending the appeal of another EEOC age-bias case against Vermont.
example.arg: The parties in the Connecticut case
pending the appeal of another EEOC age-bias case against Vermont.

example.name: stay-n: just arg1
example.text: A federal judge granted a temporary stay of the California Student Aid Commission 's emergency action to stop guaranteeing loans for National Technical Schools , a unit of United Education& Software Inc .
example.arg: the California Student Aid Commission 's emergency action to stop guaranteeing loans for National Technical Schools , a unit of United Education& Software Inc .

example.name: stay-n: with beneficiary
example.text: Support Troy Davis and his stay of 25 days of execution

example.name: stay-n: both args
example.text: Judge Vaughn Walker lifted his stay of his previous decision

roleset.note: STAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stay' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'remain' (from stay.03-v predicate notes)
STAY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stay-v.02. No corresponding VNcls. (from stay.02-n)

roleset.name: linger

example.name: stay_on-v: ergative
example.text: He-1 intends *trace*-1 to stay on until he reached the conventional retirement age of 65 in October 1991.
example.arg: until he reached the conventional retirement age of 65 in October 1991.

roleset.note: STAY_ON-V NOTES: Might take Arg3 "attributive" as "stay" above, also. (from stay.02-v)

roleset.name: remain in a location (usually for the night)

example.name: stay_over-v: both args
example.text: %um The sixteenth you 'd have to stay over in Boston anyway %uh if you did that .

roleset.note: STAY_OVER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home. Member of VNcls lodge-46. (from stay.04-v)
